typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Transaction as integer,
		Customer as integer,
		Amount as decimal(18,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> quicktable
source(output(
		customerid as integer,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Transaction
Join2 join(joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join3 join(joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join2
quicktable join(joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join3
